<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>: try {
File file = new File("myfile.txt");

writer.close();
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the PrintWriter class to write to a file. You can create a new PrintWriter object and pass in the file object to write to the file. Then you can write to the file using the write() method and close the writer when you are done.
